title: 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor Iron Frame Mirrors Art Round Home Hanging Mirrors for Living Room/Bedroom/Bathroom/Entryway (Medium Size 15.7 inch)
descriptions:
Introducing the 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor, a perfect addition to elevate the style of your space. 

With its captivating design of circles within circles, this wall art exudes a modern and artistic vibe, making it an ideal choice for those seeking novelty home decor. The set includes two mirrors, allowing you to create a symmetrical or asymmetrical arrangement, giving you the freedom to express your creativity. 

Each mirror measures 15.7 inches in diameter when including the frame, while the mirror alone has a diameter of 10 inches. The frame is crafted from durable iron, ensuring longevity and stability. Installing these mirrors is a breeze, as they can be effortlessly hung with a single screw. 

These mirrors are not only visually appealing but also practical. Weighing just 2 pounds each, they are lightweight and easy to handle. The glass used is of high quality annealed glass, guaranteeing HD imaging and preventing warping and distortion. 

The frame is finished in a stunning gold color, striking a balance between matte and bright. This versatile color effortlessly complements various decoration styles, allowing you to seamlessly integrate it into your existing decor. 

Wherever you choose to place these mirrors, be it your living room, bedroom, bathroom, entryway, or office space, they are sure to enhance the ambiance and create a focal point. They can be combined with other wall art pieces such as paintings, wall sculptures, and candle sconces, or styled independently to suit your preferences. 

Rest assured, your mirrors will arrive in a decent package to ensure their safe delivery. Elevate your space with the 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor today!
